reviewText: I watched this video knowing that authors and filmmakers use information to make their points.  Sometimes information is taken out of content.  There is a lot of information that if you have done your own research you will find yourself.  Some things you have to take with a grain of salt because you know they are trying to prove a point. Be educated when taking all of this in.  Otherwise it was a good video.

Endgame & Fall of the Republic is a must see for those searching the truth about the secreative elite who are planning for the destruction of America & a total takeover by the UN in the near future.  The powerful elite working in stealth without the majority of Americans fully understanding the consequences of their plans is documented in these two films by Alex Jones. Highly recommended. The films are provocative & worth purchasing.

Alex Jones is one of the best Political Doco filmakers of our time. Once you watch any of his many films like these, your eyes will be open to the corruption within sections of the Govt here and abroad. The Facts are outlined clearly in the films. Do yourself a favour and watch these and decide for yourself. If you agree then you can pass it on and open other people's eyes. 2 thumbs up for these. Awesome.
